title: Prohibits application of pesticides in bodies of water that are used as a source of drinking water, except those used for the disinfection of drinking water
summary: Prohibits the application of pesticides in bodies of water that are used as a source of drinking water, excepting those used for the purpose of disinfection of drinking water.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3771

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. FARRELL -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation  to  the
         application of pesticides to drinking water

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 33-1301 of the environmental  conservation  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new subdivision 12 to read as follows:
    3    12. FOR ANY PERSON TO APPLY ANY PESTICIDE TO A WATER BODY WITH A WATER
    4  SUPPLY  INTAKE THAT IS USED FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING WATER FOR HUMAN
    5  CONSUMPTION, EXCEPT FOR PESTICIDES USED  FOR  THE  PURPOSE  OF  DRINKING
    6  WATER DISINFECTION.
    7    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
    8  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07307-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the application of pesticides to drinking water
